::Kup/Lord Elder::
   
  Kup allows Nightlight to care for her husband.
   
  Kup: He needs medical attention, quickly.
   
  Elder turns back to them after the last comm message.
   
  Elder: Medics are on their way. Like you said earlier, I don't think we should move him untill we know it won't harm him further.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:
            Nightlight:
   
  Nightlight followed Kup She only tought to go to Rodimus's side, she also feared that he would be dead
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 10, 2007 9:48 AM
  Subject: Re: A Fallen Legend
  

      ::Kup::
   
  Kup sprung up and around, hugging Nighlight, knowing that she was in shock. He tried to motion her down to the side of her husband.


  .
